folder: Park Avenue & Church Street, Staten Island, NY
text:
Park Avenue, at Church Street and the Staten Island Railroad grade crossing. The view is eastward along the tracks across Park Avenue and shows the Port Richmond railroad station (platform).

June 1, 1935
P. L. Sperr
(2)
A view of the newly constructed railroad trestle at
Park Avanue. The view is north on Park Avenue. The house on
the left is No. 56.

April 28, 1936
P. L. Sperr
